data.name: VersionKeyValidExplanation
data.value: MTA-STS version. Currently, only STSv1 is supported.

data.name: VersionKeyInvalidExplanation
data.value: {0} is invalid. Currently, only STSv1 is supported for the version key.

data.name: ModeKeyEnforceExplanation
data.value: Enforce mode: Sending MTAs MUST NOT deliver the message to hosts that fail MX matching or certificate validation or that do not support STARTTLS.

data.name: ModeKeyTestingExplanation
data.value: Testing mode: Sending MTAs that also implement the TLSRPT (TLS Reporting) specification [RFC8460](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8460) send a report indicating policy application failures (as long as TLSRPT is also implemented by the recipient domain); in any case, messages may be delivered as though there were no MTA-STS validation failure.

data.name: ModeKeyNoneExplanation
data.value: None mode: Sending MTAs should treat the Policy Domain as though it does not have any active policy.

data.name: ModeKeyInvalidExplanation
data.value: Invalid mode key, mode should be set to one of enforce, testing or none.

data.name: MaxAgeKeyValidExplanation
data.value: Max lifetime of the policy is {0} seconds.

data.name: MaxAgeKeyInvalidValidExplanation
data.value: '{0}' is an invalid value for max_age, please use an integer between 0 and 31557600 seconds.

data.name: MxKeyValidExplanation
data.value: Mail for this domain may be handled by MX {0}.

data.name: MxKeyInvalidExplanation
data.value: {0} is in an invalid host format.
